column1: Digitalisation, Computing and Electronics - BSc and MSc
column5: Digitalisation, Computing and Electronics is a degree programme providing solid skills and an extensive knowledge base in technologies required in the digitalised world.Students get exposed to a wide range of ICT related teaching and research available at the University of
